snippet: Christopher Leonard, 17, was released from the hospital after surviving being brutally beaten at the Word of Life Christian Church in central New York this month and plans to testify against at least one of his attackers.
abstract: Christopher Leonard, 17-year-old who was brutally beaten at Word of Life Christian Church in New Hartford, NY, along with his 19-year-old brother Lucas, who died following the assault, will testify against their half sister Sarah Ferguson, who was one of the attackers.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Leonard, 17, was released from the hospital after surviving being brutally beaten at the Word of Life Christian Church in central New York this month and plans to testify against at least one of his attackers.

headline.main: Brother Who Survived Beating at New York Church Is to Testify Against Relative
headline.print_headline: Church Beatings Survivor to Testify Against Relative

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Word of Life Christian Church (New Hartford, NY)
